roleset.name: blameworthy, responsible for
roleset.note: CULPABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, comparison to 'blame'. (from culpable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: The system and the people who operate in the system are equally culpable .
example.arg: The system and the people who operate in the system

example.name: both args
example.text: Elected Democrats were culpable for the Iraq War also.
